article_title: Anchorage Project Access: Proud to meet desperate medical needs in the community
article_text: Average demographic characteristics for the average Anchorage Project Access patient in 2015 are the single Caucasian female 50-59 years of age. Although many of our patients may be unemployed for a variety of reasons, over 30 percent are working full or part time or are self-employed without health benefits. Education remains fairly consistent for our patients with the majority being high school graduates. However, over 38 percent have attended some college or are college graduates. The homeless situation continues to be a major problem in Anchorage and accounts for more than 48 percent of our patients. The typical Anchorage Project Access patient is the person who helps you with your groceries, cuts your hair or sits next to you at church. She is your neighbor.

article_metadata.description: OPINION: Anchorage volunteers come together to give medical care to those who can't afford much outside the emergency room.

og.description: OPINION: Anchorage volunteers come together to give medical care to those who can't afford much outside the emergency room.

Average demographic characteristics for the average Anchorage Project Access patient in 2015 are the single Caucasian female 50-59 years of age.
The typical Anchorage Project Access patient is the person who helps you with your groceries, cuts your hair or sits next to you at church.
However, over 38 percent have attended some college or are college graduates.
The homeless situation continues to be a major problem in Anchorage and accounts for more than 48 percent of our patients.
Education remains fairly consistent for our patients with the majority being high school graduates.
